items.title: Lana's Flower by Crude Things
items.summary: Lana's Flower by Crude Things was originally designed to be painted by hand onto fabric. The "Lana's Flower" subject work series consists of eight exclusive flower designs that are each limited to 1,000 clothing applications per year. Each of the NFTs in this series contain…
items.content_html:
Lana's Flower by Crude Things was originally designed to be painted by hand onto fabric. The "Lana's Flower" subject work series consists of eight exclusive flower designs that are each limited to 1,000 clothing applications per year. 

 

  • Subject Work Series Title: Lana's Flower by Crude Things
  • Yearly Item Limit for this Subject Work: 1,000

items.title: Candy Skull by Crude Things
items.summary: The Candy Skull series by Crude Things was originally stenciled onto clothing by the artist's hand. The owner of each of the NFTs in this series is granted an exclusive copyright license to produce clothing featuring this artwork, subject to the Non-fungible Token Agreement, limited to…
items.content_html:
The Candy Skull series by Crude Things was originally stenciled onto clothing by the artist's hand. The owner of each of the NFTs in this series is granted an exclusive copyright license to produce clothing featuring this artwork, subject to the Non-fungible Token Agreement, limited to a maximum of 1,000 clothing applications per year. 
  • Subject Work Series Title: "Candy Skull by Crude Things"
  • Yearly Allocation for each Subject Work: 1,000
  • Ethereum Contract Address: 0xb39d55E3FcCF30700323B71D83fD103b227b309F0xb39d55E3FcCF30700323B71D83fD103b227b309F
  • Artist / Creator: Crude Things
  • Artist's Copyright Assignment

Each of the NFTs in this series contain an exlcusive copyright license embeded in the metadata. REVIEW THIS LICENSE CAREFULLY prior to acquiring the NFT. The use of the copyright embedded in this NFT is subject to important limitations and subject to the terms and conditions of this license agreement. Acquiring or minting this NFT or attempting to invoike any of the rights granted by the exclusive license contained in the metadata constitutes your electronic signature and consent to this agreement. 

Subject Work Series

  • Subject Work Name: Blue Candy Skull
  • Current Allocation: 1,000 
  • Non-fungible Token Agreement REVIEW THIS LICENSE CAREFULLY prior to acquiring the NFT.
 The Blue Candy Skull is one of ten designs in stitched.eth's Candy Skull by Crude Things series. The design was originally stenciled onto clothing. The owner of each of the NFTs in this series is granted an exclusive copyright license to produce clothing featuring this artwork, subject to the Non-fungible Token Agreement, limited to a maximum of 1,000 clothing applications per year. 

Copyright Limitations

The use of the copyright embedded in this NFT is subject to important limitations, terms and conditions of the Non-fungible Token Agreement linked above. Acquiring or minting this NFT or attempting to invoke any of the rights granted by the license contained in the Non-fungible Token Agreement constitutes your electronic signature and consent to this agreement.  If you intend to manufacture clothing with this artwork, you may also contact the artist in advance of acquiring the NFT.

items.title: $THREAD Airdrop
items.summary: You can obtain our governance token, called $THREAD, by participating in our ecosystem, attending events, and helping stitched.eth grow and thrive. You can vote your tokens on matters ranging from what artists are invited to where to allocation treasury funds. Learn more about how to…
items.content_html:
You can obtain our governance token, called $THREAD, by participating in our ecosystem, attending events, and helping stitched.eth grow and thrive. You can vote your tokens on matters ranging from what artists are invited to where to allocation treasury funds. Learn more about how to obtain $THREAD tokens below.

What is the $THREAD token?

stitched.eth will be governed by holders of our $THREAD token. All of the $THREAD token holders will have the ability to vote, in proportion to the number of tokens they hold, on all governance matters, including which artists to invite, how to spend the treasury, and which art to mint into Design NFTs. 

How to get the $THREAD token?

stitched.eth does not sell $THREAD tokens, but $THREAD holders may of course transfer them since they have custody over the tokens - stitched.eth does not retain any control over the tokens once they're assigned. The only way to obtain tokens from stitched.eth is to "earn" them by participating in our ecosystem, attending events and accomplishing any of a number of tasks that the community needs from time to time. 

Here's what you need to do to get started:

  1. First, make sure you have a polygon wallet (it's free! if you're confused or having trouble doing this, reach out in our discord server and we'll help), and register for the airdrop here on our google form. All you *have* to do is to leave your polygon wallet address and a confirmation code, but if you plan on earning tokens by participating in IRL events, social media activity, or other means, you will want to share the relevant information on that form so that we know where to send your tokens for that participation. 
  2. Second, participate! There's a number of ways to earn $THREAD tokens right now. See the chart below for detailed information. The qualifying activities and specific reward amounts are subject to change at any time, and will certainly change as the community grows and changes. $THREAD holders will be able to vote on these changes.
  3. Third, once you've participated, we'll send you the $THREAD tokens. If you think we didn't send you what you earned, reach out to us on our discord server! We will be airdropping at various times. 

Here's how you can qualify for the initial $THREAD airdrop right now:

Current Qualifying Airdrop Activities

Activity Token Earn
Follow @stitchedeth on Twitter +1
Follow @stitched.eth on Instagram +1
Join our discord +1
Attend an IRL life event with us +5
Tag us on social media at one of our events +5
Acquire a registered garment +20
Participate in a Photoshoot +30
Help promote us on Twitter or Instagram +1 to +100
Join the stitched.eth ecosystem as an artist +100
Acquire a Design NFT +100

Create or contribute to a LP*

contact us in discord for more information

 +1 to +1000
